Welcome to PigLatin’s documentation!¶

A module to translate English into PigLatin.

Take consonants that start a word, place them at the end of the word and add “ay”.

If a vowel starts the word, just append “ay” to the end.

piglatin.translate(sentence)[source]¶

Return an English sentence translated as PigLatin.
